title: Love at first sight
abstract: A battle for survival over dinner.
description: An unhappy couple plan a special anniversary dinner but neither realises just how "special" the other has made it. A new husband discovers that he is just the latest in a long line of young men that his powerful older wife has seduced. A gigolo versus black widow battle of the sexes from the director of 'Babe' (1995). Cast features June Salter and Richard Moir. Original format 16mm/black and white.
